overview: The stormy life of the Mexican bullfighter Rodolfo Rodr√≠guez Gonzalez and his alter ego "THE PANA", of very humble origin, who worked as a baker, gravedigger, bundles loader, seller of gelatinas, before he became a bullfighter. A man to the conquest of his dreams and the glory that slips between his hands because of the bipolarity, the schizophrenia, the narcissism and his eternal addiction to the alcohol.
title: The Apizaco Shaman
